name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex XDR
description: This plugin fetches indicators of type SHA256 and MD5 from Palo Alto Networks Cortex XDR and supports the sharing of SHA256, MD5, and URL (Domain and IPv4) indicators to the Palo Alto Networks Cortex XDR platform.

configuration.label: Base URL
configuration.description: Base URL of the Palo Alto Networks Cortex XDR tenant. e.g. https://api-TENANTNAME.xdr.REGION.paloaltonetworks.com

configuration.label: API Key ID
configuration.description: API Key ID can be found in API Keys under Configurations section from Palo Alto Networks Cortex XDR Platform.

configuration.label: API Key
configuration.description: API Key can be found in API Keys under Configurations section from Palo Alto Networks Cortex XDR Platform.

configuration.label: Authentication Method
configuration.description: Select the authentication method that is used while creating the API Key.

configuration.label: Enable Polling
configuration.description: Enable/Disable polling Threat IoCs from Palo Alto Networks Cortex XDR. Disable if you only need to push Threat IoCs to Palo Alto Networks Cortex XDR.

configuration.label: Type of Threat data to pull
configuration.description: Type of Threat data to pull. Allowed values are SHA256 and MD5.

configuration.label: Severity
configuration.description: Only indicators with matching severity will be saved.

configuration.label: Initial Range (in days)
configuration.description: Number of days to pull the Threat IoCs for the initial run.
